price: Meryem: “Senden Rahman’a sığınırım, eğer takvâ sahibi bir kimse isen” dedi.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
